## IBlend interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBlend<F, T extends TypedArray, P> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [blend(op, dest, opts)](./pixel.iblend.blend.md) | Uses given <code>op</code> function to blend / compose pixels of this buffer with those of <code>dest</code> and writes results into <code>dest</code>. Supports same options as <code>blit()</code>. |
